castro_carazo_description:
During my studies, I developed complete web applications with modern technologies, consolidating my skills in software engineering. I learned about networks and computer architecture, gaining a deep understanding of the technological infrastructure that supports applications.

My training included an intensive focus on algorithms and data structures, solving complex problems and optimizing solutions. I also participated in group projects that simulated real work environments, strengthening my competencies in teamwork and project management.

This learning covered all phases of the software life cycle, from requirements gathering to design, development, testing, and implementation, giving me a comprehensive perspective to create effective software solutions aligned with user needs and business objectives.
steve_quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. - Steve Jobs
about_1: I’m a developer driven by a desire to understand the 'why' behind every line of code. My passion lies in solving real-world problems with technology, creating solutions that feel natural, intuitive, and purposeful.
about_2: While I specialize in full-stack development, I see myself as a problem solver at heart. Whether it's optimizing user experiences or building robust backends, I’m always focused on creating clean, efficient, and meaningful code that serves the bigger picture.

contact_form.name: Your Name
contact_form.follow_up: Thank you for taking the time to write. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

highschool_description: During my high school education, I acquired basic knowledge in programming, database administration, networks, hardware, and software. I participated in software development and system maintenance projects, strengthening my skills in problem solving and teamwork. My technical training provided me with a solid foundation to continue my studies in computer engineering and develop my career in the field of technology.

simetria.description_1: I developed a complete application, from database design to user interface implementation, ensuring a functional and efficient product.
simetria.description_2: Collaborated with a team of developers to optimize the application architecture and enhance the user experience through agile methodology.
simetria.description_3: Designed and implemented backend and frontend features using modern technologies such as .NET Core, React, and MySQL, ensuring robust development.
simetria.description_4: Participated in planning meetings and code reviews to ensure the quality and consistency of the final product.

portfolio.title: Personal Website
portfolio.description: I developed my personal portfolio to showcase my skills and projects. I used React and libraries like React-Router, i18Next, Framer motion , with the help of TailwindCSS for styling, creating a complete web application with a modern and functional design.

gymapp.title: Gym App
gymapp.description: I am developing a modular Full-Stack application for gym management using a multi-layered architecture to ensure scalability, flexibility, and maintainability. The project focuses on key features such as user and role management, gym entity management, and robust security mechanisms, leveraging modern technologies.
